mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=1 then cashbook_price END) january, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=2 then cashbook_price END) february, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=3 then cashbook_price END) march, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=4 then cashbook_price END) april, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=5 then cashbook_price END) may, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=6 then cashbook_price END) june, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=7 then cashbook_price END) july, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=8 then cashbook_price END) august, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=9 then cashbook_price END) september, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=10 then cashbook_price END) october, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=11 then cashbook_price END) november, sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=12 then cashbook_price END) december FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = 2019 AND cashbook_kind = "지출" GROUP BY Year(cashbook_date)

SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) '년', sum(case when cashbook_kind='수입' then cashbook_price END) '수입', sum(case when cashbook_kind='지출' then cashbook_price END) '지출' FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} GROUP BY Year(cashbook_date)

SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, nvl(SUM(case when category_name='관광' then cashbook_price END), 0)'관광', nvl(sum(case when category_name='급여' then cashbook_price END), 0) '급여', nvl(sum(case when category_name='생활' then cashbook_price END), 0) '생활', nvl(sum(case when category_name='식비' then cashbook_price END), 0) '식비', nvl(sum(case when category_name='용돈' then cashbook_price END), 0) '용돈', nvl(sum(case when category_name='의료' then cashbook_price END), 0) '의료' FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year}

SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) '년', sum(case when YEAR(cashbook_date)=2018 then cashbook_price END) 'a지출', sum(case when YEAR(cashbook_date)=2019 then cashbook_price END) 'b지출', sum(case when YEAR(cashbook_date)=2020 then cashbook_price END) 'c지출' FROM cashbook
